bike.description: Jamis Performance Racing Geometry Synthesis Aluminum 6061 double-butted main frame, tapered top tube, ovalized down tube, butted chainstays, twin seat stays, 1 1/8-1.5" tapered head tube, Press Fit 30 BB shell, 34.9mm seat tube and replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Jamis Xenith Team level, high modulus carbon fiber, 1.5" hollow formed crown, monocoque one-piece forming technology, carbon dropouts with stainless axle interfaces
Ritchey Pro Logic Drop-In, sealed bearing, 1 1/8-1 1/2"

Mavic Ksyrium Equipe wheelset, 20H, 24mm rim profile with UB Control, SUP and H2 technology, Mavic alloy hubs with QRM bearings and FTS-L freehub and Isopulse laced straight pull aerodynamic stainless spokes
Vittoria Rubino Pro Slick, 700 x 23c, folding
Shimano Ultegra RD-6700 rear and Ultegra FD-6700 braze-on front with 34.9mm alloy clamp
Shimano Ultegra ST- 6700 Dual Control STI, 20-Speed
Ritchey Comp Logic Curve, 6061 double-butted aluminum, 31.8 x 400mm (48/51), 420mm (54/56), 440mm (58/61)
Ritchey Pro 4-Axis, 3D net forged 6061 alloy, 6JAMIS_DEGREE x 90mm (48/51), 100mm (54/56), 120mm (58/61)
Jamis carbon fiber micro-adjust, 31.6 x 300mm with Jamis 7075-AL CNC aluminum 1-bolt seat post clamp
Selle San Marco Concor with Microfil cover and hollow chromoly rails
FSA PressFit 30 with Wheels MFG adaptors
Shimano BR560 dual-pivot calipers with Shimano Ultegra ST-6700 STI brake levers
